Method Detail

contactStreamSpin

protected void contactStreamSpin(int requestType,
                                 AnswerWrapper answer,
                                 java.lang.String... args)
Continuously checks if the client have received an answer from StreamSpin yet, and if yes, sets the answer in the AnswerWrapper object

Parameters:
requestType - The type of request made to StreamSpin
1. Reserved. (For testing purposes)
2. Returns any updates not delivered to client yet
3. Used to deliver a message to another online user
4. Sets the users interest profile
5. Sets the users location
6. Retrieves a users list of friends
7. Sends a message to another user
8. Validates the users credentials and returns all
the information the client needs to populate its menus
and internal structures at the time of login

answer - Callback object which will have its answer set when StreamSpinContact receives an answer from StreamSpin.
args - Any additional URL GET arguments beside username and password, which is sent with all requests. arguments are passed as strings in the form "args=value"

contactStreamSpinAsync

private void contactStreamSpinAsync(int requestType,
                                    java.lang.String... args)
Sends a GET request to StreamSpin, and assigns the answer to the "xml" string once received.

Parameters:
requestType - See contactStreamSpin(int requestType, AnswerWrapper answer, String... args)
args - See contactStreamSpin(int requestType, AnswerWrapper answer, String... args)
